name: Julie - Medical Professional
description: Professional medical examination flow with abdominal compression exam and controlled inflation procedures

range_0_10.message: [Char] places her hands firmly on [Player]'s abdomen and presses deeply, finding the belly completely soft and pliable. Baseline state - no distension detected. The intestines feel empty and compliant.

range_11_20.message: [Char] presses firmly into [Player]'s midsection, feeling slight resistance. Minimal distension present. I can feel the beginning of gas accumulation in the colon. Early stage inflation confirmed.

range_21_30.message: [Char] compresses deeply, noting the increased firmness. Moderate filling detected. The ascending colon is beginning to expand nicely. Your body is accepting the volume well.

range_31_40.message: [Char] applies moderate pressure, feeling growing resistance. Notable distension present. The colon is filling steadily now.

range_41_50.message: [Char] applies firm pressure, feeling substantial resistance. Significant distension present. The entire colon is well-inflated now. I can trace the outline of your expanded intestines quite clearly.

range_51_60.message: [Char] presses carefully into the taut belly, finding it quite firm. Substantial inflation achieved. Your abdomen is beautifully distended.

range_61_70.message: [Char] notes the dramatically swollen belly. The pressure must be quite intense now. Your intestines are expanding impressively.

range_71_80.message: [Char] examines the dramatically swollen belly with professional admiration. Impressive capacity. Your intestines are approaching maximum safe expansion. The skin is stretched taut.

range_81_90.message: [Char] palpates the enormous belly with evident satisfaction. Remarkable distension. You're approaching the upper limits of safe expansion.

range_91_100.message: [Char] carefully palpates the enormous, drum-tight belly with evident satisfaction. Extraordinary distension. You're at the upper limits of safe expansion. Your belly is magnificent - absolutely stuffed with air.

range_over_100.message: [Char]'s eyes widen as she examines the impossibly bloated belly, stretched beyond normal limits. Exceptional! You've exceeded standard capacity parameters. This level of inflation is remarkable.

data.label: Pulse Count
data.prompt: Enter the number of pressure pulses (1 second on, 1 second off each):

data.label: Pulse Announcement
data.message: [Char] adjusts the pump settings with practiced precision. I'm going to use the pulse pump to further pressurize your intestines - {PulseCount} rapid pulses. Each burst will force more air deep into your colon. Brace yourself.

data.label: Pulse Complete
data.message: [Char] observes [Player]'s swelling belly with satisfaction. Pulsing complete. Each burst pushed the air deeper, expanding you from the inside. How does that added pressure feel?

data.label: Pump Duration
data.prompt: Enter continuous pump duration in seconds:

data.label: Continuous Announcement
data.message: [Char] reaches for the pump controls with a gleam in her eye. Initiating continuous inflation for {PumpDuration} seconds. This will steadily expand your intestines without pause. Try to relax and accept the growing pressure.

data.label: Continuous Complete
data.message: [Char] releases the pump control and examines [Player]'s expanded belly. Inflation cycle complete. Your abdomen has grown considerably. Let me examine the results of our work.
